document.full_text: fifa president sepp blatter denied soccer's governing body was in crisis on monday, saying his organization would solve any "difficulties" internally and that there were no issues with the 2018 or 2022 world cups.
document.title: crisis? there is no crisis, says fifa president
lines_and_colors: fifa president sepp blatter denied soccer's governing body was in crisis on monday, saying his organization would solve any "difficulties" internally and that there were no issues with the 2018 or 2022 world cups.
